TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Convert extends System.Object
public ref class Convert abstract sealed

summary.span: 將基底資料類型轉換為其他基底資料類型。

span.span: Converts a base data type to another base data type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態方法類別主要用來在.NET Framework 支援的基底資料型別來回轉換。The static methods of the class are primarily used to support conversion to and from the base data types in the .NET Framework. 支援的基底類型為， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，，和。The supported base types are , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 颾魤 ㄛ類別包含方法，以支援其他類型的轉換。In addition, the class includes methods to support other kinds of conversions. 本主題包含下列章節：This topic consists of the following sections: [基底類型的轉換](#Base) [Conversions to and from Base Types](#Base) [非十進位數字](#NonDecimal) [Non-Decimal Numbers](#NonDecimal) [從自訂的物件轉換為基底類型](#Custom) [Conversions from Custom Objects to Base Types](#Custom) [特定文化特性格式資訊](#Culture) [Culture-Specific Formatting Information](#Culture) [Base64 編碼](#Base64) [Base64 Encoding](#Base64) [其他常見的轉換Other Common Conversions](#Other) ## 基底類型的轉換Conversions to and from Base Types 轉換方法可用來將每個基底型別轉換成每個其他基底型別。A conversion method exists to convert every base type to every other base type. 不過，實際呼叫特定的轉換方法可以產生一個五個結果，在執行階段的基底類型和目標基底類型的值而定。However, the actual call to a particular conversion method can produce one of five outcomes, depending on the value of the base type at run time and the target base type. 這五種結果是：These five outcomes are: - 沒有任何轉換。No conversion. 嘗試從類型轉換至其本身時，發生這種的情況 (例如，藉由呼叫類型的引數與)。This occurs when an attempt is made to convert from a type to itself (for example, by calling with an argument of type ). 在此情況下，此方法只會傳回原始類型的執行個體。In this case, the method simply returns an instance of the original type. - 。An . 會發生這種情況時不支援特定的轉換。This occurs when a particular conversion is not supported. 擲回下列轉換：An is thrown for the following conversions: - 從不要， ， ， ，或。Conversions from to , , , , or . - 從不， ， ， ，或至。Conversions from , , , , or to . - 從不以外的任何其他類型到。Conversions from to any other type except . - 從任何其他類型的轉換除外至。Conversions from any other type, except , to . - 。A . 會發生這種情況時嘗試將字串值轉換成任何其他基底型別會失敗，因為字串不正確的格式。This occurs when the attempt to convert a string value to any other base type fails because the string is not in the proper format. 下列轉換會擲回例外狀況：The exception is thrown for the following conversions: - 將字串轉換成的值不等於或。A string to be converted to a value does not equal or . - 要轉換成字串值是由多個字元所組成。A string to be converted to a value consists of multiple characters. - 要轉換成任何數值類型的字串無法辨識為有效的數字。A string to be converted to any numeric type is not recognized as a valid number. - 要轉換成字串無法辨識為有效的日期和時間值。A string to be converted to a is not recognized as a valid date and time value. - 成功的轉換。A successful conversion. 針對先前的結果中未列出的兩個不同的基底類型之間轉換，所有的擴展轉換，以及所有不會導致資料遺失的縮小轉換會成功，且該方法會傳回目標的基底類型的值。For conversions between two different base types not listed in the previous outcomes, all widening conversions as well as all narrowing conversions that do not result in a loss of data will succeed and the method will return a value of the targeted base type. - 。An . 會發生這種情況時縮小轉換結果，遺失的資料。This occurs when a narrowing conversion results in a loss of data. 例如，嘗試轉換執行個體，其值是 10000 來輸入則會擲回因為 10000 的範圍之外資料型別。For example, trying to convert a instance whose value is 10000 to a type throws an because 10000 is outside the range of the data type. 如果數值類型的轉換導致遺失有效位數 （亦即，遺失某些最小有效位數），將不會擲回例外狀況。An exception will not be thrown if the conversion of a numeric type results in a loss of precision (that is, the loss of some least significant digits). 不過，如果結果大於可以由特定的轉換方法的傳回值類型，例外狀況就會擲回。However, an exception will be thrown if the result is larger than can be represented by the particular conversion method's return value type. 例如，當轉換成，可能會發生遺失有效位數，但會擲回任何例外狀況。For example, when a is converted to a , a loss of precision might occur but no exception is thrown. 不過，如果大小太大而無法由，會發生溢位例外狀況。However, if the magnitude of the is too large to be represented by a , an overflow exception is thrown. ## 非十進位數字Non-Decimal Numbers 類別包含靜態方法，您可以呼叫以將整數值轉換成非十進位字串表示法，並將轉換字串為整數值，表示非十進位數字。The class includes static methods that you can call to convert integral values to non-decimal string representations, and to convert strings that represent non-decimal numbers to integral values. 每一種轉換方法包含`base`可讓您指定之數字系統; binary (基底 2)、 八進位 (基底 8) 和十六進位 (基底 16)，以及十進位 (基底 10) 的引數。Each of these conversion methods includes a `base` argument that lets you specify the number system; binary (base 2), octal (base 8), and hexadecimal (base 16), as well as decimal (base 10). 還有一組方法，將每個符合 CLS 標準的基本整數類資料類型轉換成字串，而將字串轉換成每個基本的整數類資料類型的其中一個：There is a set of methods to convert each of the CLS-compliant primitive integral types to a string, and one to convert a string to each of the primitive integral types: - 和、 將轉換的位元組值與字串中指定的基底。 and , to convert a byte value to and from a string in a specified base. - 和，以將 16 位元帶正負號的整數，與指定的基底中的字串。 and , to convert a 16-bit signed integer to and from a string in a specified base. - 和，以將 32 位元帶正負號的整數，與指定的基底中的字串。 and , to convert a 32-bit signed integer to and from a string in a specified base. - 和，以將 64 位元帶正負號的整數，與指定的基底中的字串。 and , to convert a 64-bit signed integer to and from a string in a specified base. - 若要將指定之格式的位元組值的字串表示轉換成帶正負號的位元組。, to convert the string representation of a byte value in a specified format to a signed byte. - 若要將指定之格式的整數的字串表示轉換成帶正負號的 16 位元整數。, to convert the string representation of an integer in a specified format to an unsigned 16-bit integer. - 若要將指定之格式的整數的字串表示轉換成不帶正負號的 32 位元整數。, to convert the string representation of an integer in a specified format to an unsigned 32-bit integer. - 若要將指定之格式的整數的字串表示轉換成不帶正負號的 64 位元整數。, to convert the string representation of an integer in a specified format to an unsigned 64-bit integer. 下列範例會將值轉換字串，以在所有支援的數值的格式。The following example converts the value of to a string in all supported numeric formats. 然後將轉換的字串值將會回到值。It then converts the string value back to a value. [!code-cpp[System.Convert#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CPP/NonDecimal1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CS/NonDecimal1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/VB/NonDecimal1.vb#2)] ## 從自訂的物件轉換為基底類型Conversions from Custom Objects to Base Types 除了支援的基底類型之間的轉換方法支援的任何自訂類型轉換成任何基底類型。In addition to supporting conversions between the base types, the method supports conversion of any custom type to any base type. 若要這樣做，必須實作自訂型別介面，定義將實作類型轉換為基底類型的每個方法。To do this, the custom type must implement the interface, which defines methods for converting the implementing type to each of the base types. 不支援的特定類型的轉換應該擲回。Conversions that are not supported by a particular type should throw an . 當傳遞給方法的自訂型別做為其第一個參數，或當`Convert.To`*型別*方法 (例如或呼叫並傳遞自訂型別的執行個體做為第一次參數，方法，接著會呼叫自訂型別實作，以執行轉換。When the method is passed a custom type as its first parameter, or when the `Convert.To`*Type* method (such as or is called and passed an instance of a custom type as its first parameter, the method, in turn, calls the custom type's implementation to perform the conversion. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的型別轉換](~/docs/standard/base-types/type-conversion.md)。For more information, see [Type Conversion in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/type-conversion.md). ## 特定文化特性格式資訊Culture-Specific Formatting Information 所有基底型別轉換方法和方法包含的型別參數的多載。All the base type conversion methods and the method include overloads that have a parameter of type . 比方說，方法有下列兩個多載：For example, the method has the following two overloads: - - 參數可以提供特定文化特性格式資訊，以協助轉換程序。The parameter can supply culture-specific formatting information to assist the conversion process. 不過，它會忽略大部分的基底型別轉換方法。However, it is ignored by most of the base type conversion methods. 它僅供下列基底型別轉換方法。如果`null`引數傳遞給這些方法，使用物件，表示目前執行緒文化特性。It is used only by the following base type conversion methods.If a `null` argument is passed to these methods, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. - 藉由將值轉換成數值類型的方法。By methods that convert a value to a numeric type. 參數由型別參數的多載和。The parameter is used by the overload that has parameters of type and . 它也會使用的型別參數的多載並物件的執行階段類型是否。It is also used by the overload that has parameters of type and if the object's run-time type is a . - 藉由將值轉換成日期和時間的方法。By methods that convert a value to a date and time. 參數由型別參數的多載和。The parameter is used by the overload that has parameters of type and . 它也會使用的型別參數的多載並物件的執行階段類型是否。It is also used by the overload that has parameters of type and if the object's run-time type is a . - 藉由包含的多載參數，將數字值轉換為字串或為字串的值。By the overloads that include an parameter and that convert either a numeric value to a string or a value to a string. 不過，任何使用者定義型別可實可以讓使用參數。However, any user-defined type that implements can make use of the parameter. ## Base64 編碼Base64 Encoding 將 Base64 編碼方式轉換為字串的二進位資料。Base64 encoding converts binary data to a string. 以 base-64 位數可以輕鬆地傳達只能傳輸 7 位元的資料通道上的資料。Data expressed as base-64 digits can be easily conveyed over data channels that can only transmit 7-bit characters. 類別包含下列方法來支援 base64 編碼： 來回轉換的位元組陣列的方法支援一組或來回的 base-64 數字字元所組成的 Unicode 字元陣列。The class includes the following methods to support base64 encoding: A set of methods support converting an array of bytes to and from a or to and from an array of Unicode characters consisting of base-64 digit characters. - 可將位元組陣列轉換為 base64 編碼的字串。, which converts a byte array to a base64-encoded string. - 可將位元組陣列轉換為 base64 編碼的字元陣列。, which converts a byte array to a base64-encoded character array. - 可將 base64 編碼字串轉換為位元組陣列。, which converts a base64-encoded string to a byte array. - 可將 base64 編碼的字元陣列轉換為位元組陣列。, which converts a base64-encoded character array to a byte array. ## 其他常見的轉換Other Common Conversions 您也可以在.NET Framework 中使用其他類別，執行不支援的靜態方法的某些轉換類別。You can use other classes in the NET Framework to perform some conversions that are not supported by the static methods of the class. 它們包括：These include: 轉換為位元組陣列Conversion to byte arrays 類別提供方法，將轉換的基本數值類型 (包括) 為位元組陣列，並從位元組陣列則會回到一項基本資料型別。The class provides methods that convert the primitive numeric types (including ) to byte arrays and from byte arrays back to primitive data types. 字元編碼和解碼Character encoding and decoding 類別和其衍生的類別 (例如和) 提供方法來編碼字元陣列或字串 (也就是將它們轉換成位元組陣列中特定的編碼方式) 和解碼已編碼的位元組陣列 （亦即，將位元組陣列轉換回 UTF16 編碼的 Unicode 字元。The class and its derived classes (such as and ) provide methods to encode a character array or a string (that is, to convert them to a byte array in a particular encoding) and to decode an encoded byte array (that is, convert a byte array back to UTF16-encoded Unicode characters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[.NET Framework 中的字元編碼](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)For more information, see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md) ## Examples 下列範例示範中的轉換方法的一些類別，包括， ，和。The following example demonstrates some of the conversion methods in the class, including , , and . [!code-cpp[System.Convert#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CPP/converter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/CS/converter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert/VB/converter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`至`conversionType`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to `conversionType`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件和`conversionType`也可以是代表任何基底或自訂類型的物件。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type, and `conversionType` can also be a object that represents any base or custom type. 若要成功，轉換`value`必須實作介面，因為此方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 此方法需要該轉換`value`至`conversionType`受到支援。The method requires that conversion of `value` to `conversionType` be supported. 此方法會使用目前執行緒的文化特性來進行轉換。This method uses the current thread's culture for the conversion. ## Examples 在下列程式碼中，說明了如何使用 方法。The following example illustrates the use of the method. [!code-cpp[convertchangetype#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convertchangetype/CPP/convertchangetype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[convertchangetype#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convertchangetype/CS/convertchangetype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[convertchangetype#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/convertchangetype/VB/convertchangetype.vb#1)]

span.para: 方法可以轉換為其他類型的列舉值。不過，它無法轉換另一個型別為列舉值，即使來源類型是列舉的基礎類型。若要將類型轉換的列舉值，使用轉型運算子 （在 C# 中) 或轉換函式 （Visual Basic 中）。下列範例說明轉換，來回大陸列舉值。 [！ 的程式碼 csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_enum2.cs#5)] [！ 的程式碼 vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_enum2.vb#5)]方法可以將可為 null 的型別轉換成另一種類型。不過，它無法轉換另一種類型的值可為 null 的型別，即使是的基礎型別。若要執行轉換，您可以使用轉型運算子 （在 C# 中) 或轉換函式 （Visual Basic 中）。下列範例說明可為 null 的型別來回轉換。 [！ 的程式碼 csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_nullable.cs#7)] [！ 的程式碼 vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_nullable.vb#7)]

The method can convert an enumeration value to another type. However, it cannot convert another type to an enumeration value, even if the source type is the underlying type of the enumeration. To convert a type to an enumeration value, use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a Continent enumeration value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_enum2.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_enum2.vb#5)] The method can convert a nullable type to another type. However, it cannot convert another type to a value of a nullable type, even if is the underlying type of the .To perform the conversion, you can use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a nullable type. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_nullable.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_nullable.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`所指定的預先定義的型別`typeCode`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to a predefined type specified by `typeCode`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type. 若要成功，轉換`value`必須實作介面，因為此方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 方法也會需要該轉換`value`至`typeCode`受到支援。The method also requires that conversion of `value` to `typeCode` be supported. 方法不支援的轉換`value`至自訂類型。The method does not support the conversion of `value` to a custom type. 若要執行這類轉換，請呼叫方法。To perform such a conversion, call the method. ## Examples 下列範例說明如何使用方法，以變更所指定的型別參數，如果可能的話。The following example illustrates how to use the method to change an to the type specified by the parameter, if possible. [!code-cpp[System.Convert.ChangeType#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cpp/changetype_01.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype01.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype01.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`至`conversionType`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to `conversionType`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件和`conversionType`也可以是代表任何基底或自訂類型的物件。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type, and `conversionType` can also be a object that represents any base or custom type. 若要成功，轉換`value`必須實作介面，因為此方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 此方法需要該轉換`value`至`conversionType`受到支援。The method requires that conversion of `value` to `conversionType` be supported. `provider`參數是實作，提供用於轉換的格式資訊。The `provider` parameter is an implementation that supplies formatting information for the conversion. 這個參數是否以及如何使用相依於基礎實作。Whether and how this parameter is used depends on the underlying implementation. 如果`value`是基底資料型別，`provider`只適用於下列轉換：If `value` is a base data type, `provider` is used only for the following conversions: - 轉換為字串，數字或數字的字串。Conversion from a number to a string, or from a string to a number. `provider` 必須是物件，物件或自訂可實作來傳回物件。`provider` must be a object, a object, or a custom implementation that returns a object. 不過，因為方法會執行預設"G"格式規範，則轉換`provider`參數沒有任何作用，如果`value`或目標類型是不帶正負號的整數。However, because the method performs the conversion using the default "G" format specifier, the `provider` parameter has no effect if `value` or the target type is an unsigned integer. 如果`provider`已`null`，則使用物件，表示目前執行緒文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. - 從轉換的值為字串，或從字串到值。Conversion from a value to a string, or from a string to a value. `provider` 必須是或物件。`provider` must be a or object. 如果`provider`已`null`，則使用物件，表示目前執行緒文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. 如果`value`是應用程式定義的型別，其可能會使用實作`provider`參數。If `value` is an application-defined type, its implementation may use the `provider` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例定義一個實作 `Temperature` 介面的 類別。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the interface. [!code-cpp[System.Convert.ChangeType#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cpp/changetype03.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype03.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype03.vb#3)] 下列範例建立的執行個體`Temperature`類別並呼叫方法，以將它轉換成支援.NET framework 上，以及基本數字型別。The following example creates an instance of the `Temperature` class and calls the method to convert it to the basic numeric types supported by the .NET Framework and to a . 它說明了方法會包裝的來源類型的呼叫實作。It illustrates that the method wraps a call to the source type's implementation. [!code-cpp[System.Convert.ChangeType#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cpp/changetype03.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype03.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype03.vb#4)]

span.para: 方法可以轉換為其他類型的列舉值。不過，它無法轉換另一個型別為列舉值，即使來源類型是列舉的基礎類型。若要將類型轉換的列舉值，使用轉型運算子 （在 C# 中) 或轉換函式 （Visual Basic 中）。下列範例說明轉換，來回大陸列舉值。 [！ 的程式碼 csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_enum2.cs#5)] [！ 的程式碼 vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_enum2.vb#5)]方法可以將可為 null 的型別轉換成另一種類型。不過，它無法轉換另一種類型的值可為 null 的型別，即使是的基礎型別。若要執行轉換，您可以使用轉型運算子 （在 C# 中) 或轉換函式 （Visual Basic 中）。下列範例說明可為 null 的型別來回轉換。 [！ 的程式碼 csharp[System.Convert.ChangeType#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/cs/changetype_nullable_1.cs#8)] [！ 的程式碼 vb[System.Convert.ChangeType#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.changetype/vb/changetype_nullable_1.vb#8)]

The method can convert an enumeration value to another type. However, it cannot convert another type to an enumeration value, even if the source type is the underlying type of the enumeration. To convert a type to an enumeration value, use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a Continent enumeration value. However, it cannot convert another type to a value of a nullable type, even if is the underlying type of the . To perform the conversion, you can use a casting operator (in C#) or a conversion function (in Visual Basic). The following example illustrates the conversion to and from a nullable type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一種一般用途的轉換方法，將所指定的物件轉換`value`所指定的預先定義的型別`typeCode`。 is a general-purpose conversion method that converts the object specified by `value` to a predefined type specified by `typeCode`. `value`參數可以是任何類型的物件。The `value` parameter can be an object of any type. 若要成功，轉換`value`必須實作介面，因為此方法只會包裝對適當的呼叫方法。For the conversion to succeed, `value` must implement the interface, because the method simply wraps a call to an appropriate method. 方法也會需要該轉換`value`至`typeCode`受到支援。The method also requires that conversion of `value` to `typeCode` be supported. 方法不支援的轉換`value`至自訂類型。The method does not support the conversion of `value` to a custom type. 若要執行這類轉換，請呼叫方法。To perform such a conversion, call the method. `provider`參數是實作，提供用於轉換的格式資訊。The `provider` parameter is an implementation that supplies formatting information for the conversion. 這個參數是否以及如何使用相依於基礎實作。Whether and how this parameter is used depends on the underlying implementation. 如果`value`是基底資料型別，`provider`只適用於下列轉換。If `value` is a base data type, `provider` is used only for the following conversions. 如果`null`引數傳遞給這些方法，使用物件，表示目前執行緒文化特性。If a `null` argument is passed to these methods, the object that represents the current thread culture is used. - 轉換為字串，數字或數字的字串。Conversion from a number to a string, or from a string to a number. `provider` 必須是物件，物件或自訂可實作來傳回物件。`provider` must be a object, a object, or a custom implementation that returns a object. 不過，因為方法會執行預設"G"格式規範，則轉換`provider`參數沒有任何作用，如果`value`或目標類型是不帶正負號的整數。However, because the method performs the conversion using the default "G" format specifier, the `provider` parameter has no effect if `value` or the target type is an unsigned integer. - 從轉換的值為字串，或從字串到值。Conversion from a value to a string, or from a string to a value. `provider` 必須是或物件。`provider` must be a or object. 如果`value`是應用程式定義的型別，其可能會使用實作`provider`參數。If `value` is an application-defined type, its implementation may use the `provider` parameter. ## Examples 下列範例會定義名為自訂的格式提供者`InterceptProvider`，指出當其方法呼叫，並傳回FR-FR 文化特性和EN-US 文化特性的物件。The following example defines a custom format provider named `InterceptProvider` that indicates when its method is called and returns a for the fr-FR culture and a object for the en-US culture. 此格式提供者會在所有呼叫方法。This format provider is used in all calls to the method. 這個範例會建立不含陣列並值並重複的呼叫每個值與每個成員列舉型別。The example then creates an array with a and a value and makes repeated calls to with each value and each member of the enumeration. 此範例說明如何使用此方法時參數，也說明如何使用`provider`參數來執行區分文化特性格式。The example illustrates when the method uses the parameter and also illustrates the use of the `provider` parameter to perform culture-sensitive formatting. summary.span: 將 Unicode 字元陣列 (將二進位資料編碼為 Base-64 位數) 的子集轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列。

span.span: Converts a subset of a Unicode character array, which encodes binary data as base-64 digits, to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer array.

summary.span: 參數會指定輸入陣列中的子集，以及要轉換的項目個數。

span.span: Parameters specify the subset in the input array and the number of elements to convert.

returns.span: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列，與 中 位置的 項目相等。

span.span: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers equivalent to elements at position in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `inArray` 是 base-64 數字、 空格字元和尾端填補字元所組成。`inArray` is composed of base-64 digits, white-space characters, and trailing padding characters. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", lowercase characters "a" to "z", numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 空白字元，及其 Unicode 名稱和十六進位的字碼指標，都使用定位字元 （字元表格，U + 0009），新行換行字元 （U + 000A）、 歸位字元 （歸位字元、 U + 000d） 和空白 （空格，U + 0020）。The white-space characters, and their Unicode names and hexadecimal code points, are tab (CHARACTER TABULATION, U+0009), newline (LINE FEED, U+000A), carriage return (CARRIAGE RETURN, U+000D), and blank (SPACE, U+0020). 任意數目的泛空白字元可以出現在`inArray`因為所有的泛空白字元會被忽略。An arbitrary number of white-space characters can appear in `inArray` because all white-space characters are ignored. 過去的字元，"="、 用於尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. 結尾`inArray`可以包含零個、 一個或兩個填補字元。The end of `inArray` can consist of zero, one, or two padding characters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一字元陣列，包含要解碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single character array that contains all the data to be decoded. 若要從資料流的 base-64 字元資料解碼，使用類別。To decode base-64 character data from a stream, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來解碼 uuencode 編碼 (base64) 的資料，並將它儲存為二進位輸出。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to decode UUencoded (base-64) data and save it as binary output. [!code-cpp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CPP/class1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CS/class1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/VB/class1.vb#3)] 下列範例示範和方法。The following example demonstrates the and methods. 輸入分為三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each. 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63. 在此範例中，有 85 3 位元組群組剩下 1 個位元組。In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining. 第一個群組是由 00，01、 02、 產生四個等於十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 的 6 位元值的十六進位值所組成。The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2. 這些四個值對應於 base-64 位數、"A"、"A"、"E"和"C"，輸出的開頭。Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits, "A", "A", "E", and "C", at the beginning of the output. 如果整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group. 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF. 第 6 位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base-64 位數"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元行會填補零，以產生對應到 base-64 數字，「 w 」 中的十進位 48。The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w". 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至毫無用處填補字元，"="。The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=". [!code-cpp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CPP/tb64ca.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CS/tb64ca.cs#1)] [!code-vb[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/VB/tb64ca.vb#1)]

span.span: An array of 8-bit unsigned integers that is equivalent to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `s` 是 base-64 數字、 空格字元和尾端填補字元所組成。`s` is composed of base-64 digits, white-space characters, and trailing padding characters. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", lowercase characters "a" to "z", numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 空白字元，及其 Unicode 名稱和十六進位的字碼指標，都使用定位字元 （字元表格，U + 0009），新行換行字元 （U + 000A）、 歸位字元 （歸位字元、 U + 000d） 和空白 （空格，U + 0020）。The white-space characters, and their Unicode names and hexadecimal code points, are tab (CHARACTER TABULATION, U+0009), newline (LINE FEED, U+000A), carriage return (CARRIAGE RETURN, U+000D), and blank (SPACE, U+0020). 任意數目的泛空白字元可以出現在`s`因為所有的泛空白字元會被忽略。An arbitrary number of white-space characters can appear in `s` because all white-space characters are ignored. 過去的字元，"="、 用於尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. 結尾`s`可以包含零個、 一個或兩個填補字元。The end of `s` can consist of zero, one, or two padding characters. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一字串，包含要解碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single string that contains all the data to be decoded. 若要從資料流的 base-64 字元資料解碼，使用類別。To decode base-64 character data from a stream, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以將位元組陣列轉換成使用 uuencode 編碼 (base64) 字串，然後再呼叫方法來還原原始的位元組陣列。The following example uses the method to convert a byte array to a UUencoded (base-64) string, and then calls the method to restore the original byte array. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String2.vb#1)] 以下是更複雜的範例會建立 32 位元整數的 20 個元素陣列。The following is a more complex example that creates a 20-element array of 32-bit integers. 然後它會使用方法，將每個項目轉換為位元組陣列，它會儲存在緩衝區中的適當位置呼叫方法。It then uses the method to convert each element into a byte array, which it stores in the appropriate position in a buffer by calling the method. 這個緩衝區會傳遞至方法來建立使用 uuencode 編碼 (base64) 字串。This buffer is then passed to the method to create a UUencoded (base-64) string. 然後它會呼叫方法來解碼的 uuencode 編碼字串和呼叫方法，將每一組的四個位元組 （32 位元整數的大小） 轉換成整數。It then calls the method to decode the UUencoded string, and calls the method to convert each set of four bytes (the size of a 32-bit integer) to an integer. 範例輸出顯示已成功還原原始的陣列。The output from the example shows that the original array has been successfully restored. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會測試是否`value`參數等於。The method tests whether the `value` parameter is equal to . 相當於下列程式碼：It is equivalent to the following code: [!code-csharp[System.Convert.IsDBNull#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.IsDBNull/cs/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.IsDBNull#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.IsDBNull/vb/Form1.vb#1)] > [!NOTE] > 用以指出遺漏的值。 is used to indicate a value that is missing. 不等於`null`或。It is not equivalent to `null` or to . 因此，程式碼這類`Convert.IsDBNull(null)`C# 中或`Convert.IsDBNull(Nothing)`Visual Basic 傳回`false`。Therefore, code such as `Convert.IsDBNull(null)` in C# or `Convert.IsDBNull(Nothing)` in Visual Basic returns`false`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用從資料庫擷取問卷資料的物件。The following example uses a object to retrieve survey data from a database. 它會將每個資料列欄位的值指派至陣列，並再將每個陣列項目方法。It assigns each row's field values to an array, and then passes each array element to the method. 如果此方法會傳回`true`，此範例會將字串"NA"指派給陣列元素。If the method returns `true`, the example assigns the string "NA" to the array element. 陣列接著會新增至的集合控制項。The array is then added to the collection of a control. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.IsDBNull#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.IsDBNull/cs/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.IsDBNull#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.IsDBNull/vb/Form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子集`length`的項目`inArray`位置開始`offsetIn`是將其視為一個數字值，轉換為中的項目子集`outArray`位置開始`offsetOut`。The subset of `length` elements of `inArray` starting at position `offsetIn`, are taken as a numeric value and converted to a subset of elements in `outArray` starting at position `offsetOut`. 傳回值，表示已轉換中的元素數目`outArray`。The return value indicates the number of converted elements in `outArray`. 子集`outArray`base-64 位數所組成。The subset of `outArray` consists of base-64 digits. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 過去的字元，"="、 用於尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offsetIn`和`offsetOut`參數都是以零為起始的陣列位置。The `offsetIn` and `offsetOut` parameters are zero-based array positions. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要從位元組資料流中建立 base-64 字元陣列，請使用類別。To create a base-64 character array from a byte stream, use the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用UUencode 方法 （格式為 base 64 編碼） 二進位資料流，然後儲存至檔案的編碼方式。The following example demonstrates using the method to UUencode (encode in base 64) a binary stream, then save the encoding to a file. [!code-cpp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CPP/class1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/CS/class1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert UUEncodeDecode functions/VB/class1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列的子集，轉換為相等的 Base-64 位數編碼的 Unicode 字元陣列子集。

span.span: Converts a subset of an 8-bit unsigned integer array to an equivalent subset of a Unicode character array encoded with base-64 digits.

summary.span: 參數會指定可在輸入和輸出陣列中當成位移 (Offset) 的子集、輸入陣列中要轉換的項目個數，以及是否要在輸出陣列中插入分行符號。

span.span: Parameters specify the subsets as offsets in the input and output arrays, the number of elements in the input array to convert, and whether line breaks are inserted in the output array.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，包含 中的位元數。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer containing the number of bytes in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子集`length`的項目`inArray`起點為位置的參數`offsetIn`是將其視為一個數字值，轉換為中的項目子集`outArray`起點為位置參數`offsetOut`。The subset of `length` elements of the `inArray` parameter starting at position `offsetIn`, are taken as a numeric value and converted to a subset of elements in the `outArray` parameter starting at position `offsetOut`. 傳回值，表示已轉換中的元素數目`outArray`。The return value indicates the number of converted elements in `outArray`. 子集`outArray`base-64 位數所組成。The subset of `outArray` consists of base-64 digits. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 過去的字元"="用於尾端填補。The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offsetIn`和`offsetOut`參數都是以零為起始的陣列位置。The `offsetIn` and `offsetOut` parameters are zero-based array positions. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要從位元組資料流中建立 base-64 字元陣列，請使用類別。To create a base-64 character array from a byte stream, use the class. 如果`options`參數設為和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。If the `options` parameter is set to and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters. 換行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000 D) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸 」，網址[ https://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 輸入分為三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each. 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63. 在此範例中，有 85 3 位元組群組剩下 1 個位元組。In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining. 第一個群組是由 00，01、 02、 產生四個等於十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 的 6 位元值的十六進位值所組成。The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2. 這些四個值對應至的 base-64 位數"A"、"A"、"E"和"C"開頭的輸出。Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits "A", "A", "E", and "C" at the beginning of the output. 如果整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group. 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF. 第 6 位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base-64 位數"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元行會填補零，以產生對應到 base-64 數字，「 w 」 中的十進位 48。The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w". 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至毫無用處填補字元，"="。The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=". [!code-cpp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CPP/tb64ca.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/CS/tb64ca.cs#1)] [!code-vb[convert.tobase64chararray#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64chararray/VB/tb64ca.vb#1)]

param.name: inArray

summary.span: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列，轉換為使用 Base-64 位數編碼的相等字串表示。

span.span: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.

returns.span: 之內容的字串表示 (格式為 Base 64)。

span.span: The string representation, in base 64, of the contents of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`會將其視為一個數字值和轉換為使用 base-64 位數編碼的字串表示。The elements of `inArray` are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 過去的字元，"="、 用於尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要將資料從資料流的編碼，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class. 一般情況下，方法不是用來反覆存取使用 uuencode 編碼 (base-64 編碼) 字串。Ordinarily, the method is not used to round-trip a UUEncoded (base-64 encoded) string. 也就是說，如果您藉由呼叫解碼字串方法，然後將傳回的位元組陣列編碼藉由呼叫方法，產生的字串不一定會完全相同的原始字串。That is, if you decode a string by calling the method, then encode the returned byte array by calling the method, the resulting string will not necessarily be identical to the original string. 只有原始字串是有效的 base-64 編碼的字串，字串將會反覆存取。The string will round-trip only if the original string is a valid base-64 encoded string. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以將位元組陣列轉換成使用 uuencode 編碼 (base64) 字串，然後再呼叫方法來還原原始的位元組陣列。The following example uses the method to convert a byte array to a UUencoded (base-64) string, and then calls the method to restore the original byte array. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String2.vb#1)] 以下是更複雜的範例會建立 32 位元整數的 20 個元素陣列。The following is a more complex example that creates a 20-element array of 32-bit integers. 然後它會使用方法，將每個項目轉換為位元組陣列，它會儲存在緩衝區中的適當位置呼叫方法。It then uses the method to convert each element into a byte array, which it stores in the appropriate position in a buffer by calling the method. 這個緩衝區會傳遞至方法來建立使用 uuencode 編碼 (base64) 字串。This buffer is then passed to the method to create a UUencoded (base-64) string. 然後它會呼叫方法來解碼的 uuencode 編碼字串和呼叫方法，將每一組的四個位元組 （32 位元整數的大小） 轉換成整數。It then calls the method to decode the UUencoded string, and calls the method to convert each set of four bytes (the size of a 32-bit integer) to an integer. 範例輸出顯示已成功還原原始的陣列。The output from the example shows that the original array has been successfully restored. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String.vb#2)]

param.name: inArray
param.span: 8 位元不帶正負號的整數的陣列。

param.name: options
param.span: 以便於每 76 個字元之後插入分行符號，或是 不插入分行符號。

span.span: to insert a line break every 76 characters, or to not insert line breaks.

summary.span: 將 8 位元不帶正負號的整數陣列，轉換為使用 Base-64 位數編碼的相等字串表示。

span.span: Converts an array of 8-bit unsigned integers to its equivalent string representation that is encoded with base-64 digits.

summary.span: 參數可指定是否要在傳回值中插入分行符號。

span.span: A parameter specifies whether to insert line breaks in the return value.

returns.span: 中項目的字串表示 (格式為 Base 64)。

span.span: The string representation in base 64 of the elements in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`參數會將其視為一個數字值和轉換成字串表示，格式為 base 64。The elements of the `inArray` parameter are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 過去的字元"="用於尾端填補。The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要將資料從資料流的編碼，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class. 如果`options`參數設為和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。If the `options` parameter is set to and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters. 換行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000 D) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A). 換行符號會被視為在 base-64 編碼的空格字元，因為它們時，會忽略轉換 base-64 編碼字串的位元組陣列。Because line breaks are considered white-space characters in a base-64 encoding, they are ignored when converting a base-64 encoded string back to a byte array. 控制項或裝置，例如主控台視窗中顯示的已編碼的字串時，會只是方便的分行符號。The line breaks are simply convenient when displaying the encoded string to a control or a device such as a console window. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸 」，網址[ https://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫與編碼所產生的 100 個元素的位元組陣列的字串中的插入列的引數會中斷。The following example calls the with a argument to insert line breaks in the string that is produced by encoding a 100-element byte array. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToBase64String#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/cs/ToBase64String3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToBase64String#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.Convert.ToBase64String/vb/ToBase64String3.vb#3)] 做為範例所示，從輸出成功還原原始的位元組陣列; 分行符號字元會在轉換期間忽略。As the output from the example shows, the succeeds in restoring the original byte array; the line break characters are ignored during the conversion.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`會將其視為一個數字值和轉換成字串表示，格式為 base 64。The elements of `inArray` are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 過去的字元，"="、 用於尾端填補。The valueless character, "=", is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offset`參數是以零為起始。The `offset` parameter is zero-based. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要將資料從資料流的編碼，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目`inArray`參數會將其視為一個數字值和轉換成字串表示，格式為 base 64。The elements of the `inArray` parameter are taken as a numeric value and converted to a string representation in base 64. Base-64 位數，按遞增順序由零是大寫字元"A"到"Z"、 小寫字元"a"到"z"、 數字"0"到"9"，以及符號"+"和"/"。The base-64 digits in ascending order from zero are the uppercase characters "A" to "Z", the lowercase characters "a" to "z", the numerals "0" to "9", and the symbols "+" and "/". 過去的字元"="用於尾端填補。The valueless character "=" is used for trailing padding. `offset`和`length`參數是 32 位元帶正負號的數字。The `offset` and `length` parameters are 32-bit signed numbers. `offset`參數是以零為起始。The `offset` parameter is zero-based. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法專門設計用來處理單一位元組陣列，其中包含要編碼的所有資料。The method is designed to process a single byte array that contains all the data to be encoded. 若要將資料從資料流的編碼，請使用類別。To encode data from a stream, use the class. 如果`options`參數設為和轉換的輸出是超過 76 個字元，會插入分行符號每 76 個字元。If the `options` parameter is set to and the output of the conversion is longer than 76 characters, a line break is inserted every 76 characters. 換行符號的定義是歸位字元 (U + 000 D) 後面接著行換頁字元 (U + 000A)。A line break is defined as a carriage return character (U+000D) followed by a line feed character (U+000A). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 2045，「 多用途網際網路郵件延伸 」，網址[ https://www.rfc-editor.org/ ](https://www.rfc-editor.org/)。For more information, see RFC 2045, "Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions", at [https://www.rfc-editor.org/](https://www.rfc-editor.org/). ## Examples 下列範例示範方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 輸入分為三個位元組 （24 位元） 每個群組。The input is divided into groups of three bytes (24 bits) each. 因此，每個群組包含四個每個數字，範圍從十進位的 0 到 63 的 6 位元數字。Consequently, each group consists of four 6-bit numbers where each number ranges from decimal 0 to 63. 在此範例中，有 85 3 位元組群組剩下 1 個位元組。In this example, there are 85 3-byte groups with one byte remaining. 第一個群組是由 00，01、 02、 產生四個等於十進位的 0、 0、 4 和 2 的 6 位元值的十六進位值所組成。The first group consists of the hexadecimal values 00, 01, and 02, which yield four 6-bit values equal to decimal 0, 0, 4, and 2. 這些四個值對應至的 base-64 位數"A"、"A"、"E"和"C"開頭的輸出。Those four values correspond to the base-64 digits "A", "A", "E", and "C" at the beginning of the output. 如果整數數字 3 位元組的群組不存在，剩餘的位元組會有效地以零填補來形成完整的群組。If an integral number of 3-byte groups does not exist, the remaining bytes are effectively padded with zeros to form a complete group. 在此範例中，最後一個位元組的值為十六進位 FF。In this example, the value of the last byte is hexadecimal FF. 第 6 位元等於十進位 63，對應為 base-64 位數"/"結尾的輸出，而接下來的 2 位元行會填補零，以產生對應到 base-64 數字，「 w 」 中的十進位 48。The first 6 bits are equal to decimal 63, which corresponds to the base-64 digit "/" at the end of the output, and the next 2 bits are padded with zeros to yield decimal 48, which corresponds to the base-64 digit, "w". 最後兩個的 6 位元值會填補，並對應至毫無用處填補字元，"="。The last two 6-bit values are padding and correspond to the valueless padding character, "=". [!code-cpp[convert.tobase64string#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64string/CPP/tb64s.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[convert.tobase64string#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64string/CS/tb64s.cs#1)] [!code-vb[convert.tobase64string#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/convert.tobase64string/VB/tb64s.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 基底型別忽略`provider`參數; 不過，可能會使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore the `provider` parameter; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別可實作和類別可實作。The following example defines a class that implements and a class that implements . 類別實作的物件保存陣列值。Objects of the class that implements hold an array of values. 每個類別的物件傳遞至方法。An object of each class is passed to the method. 這個方法會傳回`true`如果非捨棄陣列任何的值非零。This method returns `true` if any of the non-discarded array values are non-zero. 物件可讓您決定如何將項目捨棄這項計算。The object determines how elements are discarded for this calculation. remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例定義一個實作 `ByteString` 介面的 類別。The following example defines a `ByteString` class that implements the interface. 此類別會儲存登 欄位中，以及一個位元組值的字串表示，使其能夠代表這兩個位元組帶正負號和不帶正負號位元組值。The class stores the string representation of a byte value along with a sign field, so that it is able to represent both signed and unsigned byte values. remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 已取得的執行個體物件。`provider` is an instance that obtains a object. 物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`. 如果`provider`已`null`，則物件會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the method instead. 它會傳回值，指出轉換是否成功或失敗。It returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed. ## Examples 下列範例會建立自訂物件，定義"neg 」，它的呼叫中使用"pos"和負號為正號方法。The following example creates a custom object that defines the positive sign as "pos" and the negative sign as "neg", which it uses in calls to the method. 然後它會呼叫方法重複，將轉換的字串陣列中每個項目值。It then calls the method repeatedly to convert each element in a string array to a value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToByte#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/cs/tobyte4.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToByte#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/vb/tobyte4.vb#14)]

exception.span: 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

span.span: does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).

exception.span: 代表小於 或大於 的數字。

span.span: represents a number that is less than or greater than .

static member ToByte : string * int -> byte

param.name: value

param.name: fromBase
param.span: value 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

span.span: The base of the number in value, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

summary.span: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數。

span.span: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 8-bit unsigned integer.

returns.span: 與 中之數字相等的 8 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 為 ，則為 0 (零)。

span.span: An 8-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in , or 0 (zero) if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料類型支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有的八位元用來代表數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。In other words, all eight bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的位元組值，超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed byte value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「 0x80 將轉換為 128。 」Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80 converts to 128." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#3)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認方法或運算子會使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明其中一種技術，為確保此方法不會發佈者出現不當使用不帶正負號二進位表示法將轉換的十六進位字串表示時值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use unsigned binary representation when it converts a hexadecimal string representation to a value. 範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 值的範例會將轉換時已回到值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value back to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 因此，且其高序位位元設定 （這表示的值為負數，而且它會使用兩個是補充而不是不帶正負號的二進位表示法），在方法擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the value is negative and that it uses two's complement instead of unsigned binary representation), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#4)] ## Examples 下列範例或者會嘗試解譯的二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位值的表示法的字串陣列。The following example alternately attempts to interpret an array of strings as the representation of binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToByte#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/cs/tobyte2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToByte#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tobyte/vb/tobyte2.vb#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`不是`null`，則傳回值是叫用的結果方法`value`使用中的格式設定資訊初始化目前的文化特性的物件。If `value` is not `null`, the return value is the result of invoking the method on `value` using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current culture. `value`引數必須包含日期的表示法，並說明其中一種格式的時間主題。The `value` argument must contain the representation of a date and time in one of the formats described in the topic. 如果 `value` 是 `null`，則方法會傳回 。If `value` is `null`, the method returns . 這個方法會嘗試剖析`value`完全並避免擲回。This method tries to parse `value` completely and avoid throwing a . 完成遺漏月、 日和年資訊使用目前的日期。It completes missing month, day, and year information with the current date. 如果`value`包含只有日期而沒有時間中，這個方法會假設午夜的時間。If `value` contains only a date and no time, this method assumes a time of midnight. 前置、 內部或尾端空格字元，在`value`都會被忽略。Any leading, inner, or trailing white-space characters in `value` are ignored. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the method instead. 它會傳回值，指出轉換是否成功或失敗。It returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，將轉換的日期和時間，以各種不同的字串表示法值。The following example uses the method to convert various string representations of dates and times to values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別可實作和類別可實作。The following example defines a class that implements and a class that implements . 類別實作的物件保存陣列值。Objects of the class that implements hold an array of values. 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToDouble`方法。An object of each class is passed to the `ToDouble` method. 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均值值，使用實作的物件來判斷要計算平均值的方式。This method returns an average of the array of values, using the object that implements to determine how to calculate the average. remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別可實作和類別可實作。The following example defines a class that implements and a class that implements . 類別實作的物件保存陣列值。Objects of the class that implements hold an array of values. 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToInt16`方法。An object of each class is passed to the `ToInt16` method. 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均值值，使用實作的物件來判斷要計算平均值的方式。This method returns an average of the array of values, using the object that implements to determine how to calculate the average. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 的數值表示法，不支援負號方法假設負數的數字會使用二補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將最高順序二進位位元的整數 （位元 15） 解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of an integer (bit 15) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例遞增，將產生的數字轉換成十六進位字串表示，然後再呼叫方法。The following example increments by one, converts the resulting number to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「 0x8000 將轉換成介於-32768。 」Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000 converts to -32768." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#5)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當的第一個擷取的數值正負號之前將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first retrieving the sign of the numeric value before converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為正數，但是在轉換回整數會產生負數值，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was positive but the conversion back to an integer yields a negative value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#6)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位字串的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成 16 位元帶正負號的整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in a string array as a hexadecimal string and to convert it to a 16-bit signed integer. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToInt16#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint16/cs/toint16_2.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToInt16#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint16/vb/toint16_2.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 的數值表示法，不支援負號方法假設負數的數字會使用二補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將最高順序二進位位元的整數 （位元 31） 的解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of an integer (bit 31) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例遞增，將產生的數字轉換成十六進位字串表示，然後再呼叫方法。The following example increments by one, converts the resulting number to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「 0x80000000 將轉換成介於-2147483648。 」Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80000000 converts to -2147483648." [!code-cpp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cpp/toint_str_int32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#1)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當的第一個擷取的數值正負號之前將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first retrieving the sign of the numeric value before converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為正數，但是在轉換回整數會產生負數值，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was positive but the conversion back to an integer yields a negative value. [!code-cpp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cpp/toint_str_int32.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義類別可實作和類別可實作。The following example defines a class that implements and a class that implements . 類別實作的物件保存陣列值。Objects of the class that implements hold an array of values. 每個類別的物件傳遞至`ToInt64`方法。An object of each class is passed to the `ToInt64` method. 這個方法會傳回一維陣列的平均值值，使用實作的物件來判斷要計算平均值的方式。This method returns an average of the array of values, using the object that implements to determine how to calculate the average. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 的數值表示法，不支援負號方法假設負數的數字會使用二補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將最高順序二進位位元長整數 （位元 63） 的解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the highest-order binary bit of a long integer (bit 63) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF 轉換為-1。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF converts to -1." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#7)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當地會先判斷值是否代表不帶正負號或帶正負號的類型時將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first determining whether a value represents an unsigned or a signed type when converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為不帶正負號的類型，但在轉換回整數的結果的值，其正負號位元為開啟，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was an unsigned type but the conversion back to an integer yields a value whose sign bit is on. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#8)] 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位字串的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換為長整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in a string array as a hexadecimal string and convert it to a long integer. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToInt64#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint64/cs/toint64_2.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToInt64#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint64/vb/toint64_2.vb#15)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`ByteString`類別，以儲存兩者帶正負號和不帶正負號為一起使用的欄位，表示正負號的位元組的十六進位字串的位元組。The following example defines a `ByteString` class that stores both signed and unsigned bytes as hexadecimal strings along with a field that indicates the sign of the byte. `ByteString` 類別會實作 介面。The `ByteString` class implements the interface. 其方法呼叫方法，以執行轉換。Its method calls the method to perform the conversion. 如果失敗，則會擲回。If it fails, it throws an . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為非基底 10 的數值表示法，不支援負號方法假設負數的數字會使用二補數表示法。Because the negative sign is not supported for non-base 10 numeric representations, the method assumes that negative numbers use two’s complement representation. 換句話說，此方法一定會將一個位元組 （7 位元） 的高序位位元解譯其正負號位元。In other words, the method always interprets the high-order bit of a byte (bit 7) as its sign bit. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼中非基底 10 編號超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a non-base 10 number that is out of the range of the data type is converted to an value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「"0xff 轉換為-1。Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0xff converts to -1." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#9)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認的方法使用適當的數值表示法，來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例所示，您可以確保，方法會處理溢位適當地會先判斷值是否代表不帶正負號或帶正負號的類型時將它轉換成其十六進位字串表示。As the following example illustrates, you can ensure that the method handles overflows appropriately by first determining whether a value represents an unsigned or a signed type when converting it to its hexadecimal string representation. 如果原始值為不帶正負號的類型，但在轉換回帶正負號的位元組會產生其正負號位元的值，會擲回例外狀況。Throw an exception if the original value was an unsigned type but the conversion back to a signed byte yields a value whose sign bit is on. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#10)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為二進位，八進位，將字串陣列中的項目和數字值的十六進位表示法，以便將它們轉換成不帶正負號的位元組。The following example attempts to interpret the elements in a string array as the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representation of numeric values in order to convert them to unsigned bytes. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToSByte#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tosbyte/cs/tosbyte3.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToSByte#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tosbyte/vb/tosbyte3.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例定義一個實作 `Temperature` 介面的 類別。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the interface. 它是實作方法會傳回私用的內部值代表溫度的變數。Its implementation of the method returns the internal value of a private variable that represents the temperature. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToSingle#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tosingle/cs/tosingle2.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToSingle#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tosingle/vb/tosingle2.vb#14)] 下列範例說明如何呼叫方法，接著呼叫實作`Temperature`類別。The following example illustrates how a call to the method, in turn, calls the implementation of the `Temperature` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`為正數及`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用正負號和大小表示。If `value` is positive and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses sign-and-magnitude representation. 如果`value`是負數和`toBase`為 2、 8 或 16，則傳回的字串會使用二補數表示法。If `value` is negative and `toBase` is 2, 8, or 16, the returned string uses two's complement representation. 這表示高序位位元組 （位元 15） 的高序位位元會解譯為正負號位元。This means that the high-order bit of the high-order byte (bit 15) is interpreted as the sign bit. 如果建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串呼叫方法，假設類似的數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫以執行轉換。If the method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a similar numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion. 這類方法包括和。Such methods include and . ## Examples 下列範例會將 16 位元帶正負號的整數陣列中每個項目轉換成其對等的二進位、 八進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。The following example converts each element in an array of 16-bit signed integers to its equivalent binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`為正數及`toBase`不是 10，傳回的字串使用的標誌大小表示。If `value` is positive and `toBase` is not 10, the returned string uses sign-and-magnitude representation. 如果`value`是負數和`toBase`不是 10，傳回的字串使用二補數表示法。If `value` is negative and `toBase` is not 10, the returned string uses two's complement representation. 這表示最高序位位元組 （位元 63） 的高序位位元會解譯為正負號位元。This means that the high-order bit of the highest-order byte (bit 63) is interpreted as the sign bit. 如果建立稍後將會轉換回數字的字串呼叫方法，假設類似的數值表示法的對應方法應該呼叫以執行轉換。If the method is called to create a string that will later be converted back to a number, a corresponding method that assumes a similar numeric representation should be called to perform the conversion. 這類方法包括和。Such methods include and . ## Examples 下列範例會將長整數陣列中的每個項目轉換成其對等的二進位、 十六進位、 十進位和十六進位字串表示。The following example converts each element in a long integer array to its equivalent binary, hexadecimal, decimal, and hexadecimal string representations. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToString2#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tostring2/cs/tostring2.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToString2#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tostring2/vb/tostring2.vb#12)] [!code-fsharp[System.Convert.ToString2#12](~/samples/snippets/fsharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tostring2/fs/tostring2.fs#12)]

span.span: is not 2, 8, 10, or 16.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`參數會實作介面，方法會呼叫實作`value`。If the `value` parameter implements the interface, the method calls the implementation of `value`. 否則，如果`value`參數會實作介面，方法會呼叫其實作。Otherwise, if the `value` parameter implements the interface, the method calls its implementation. 如果`value`實作以上兩者的介面方法呼叫`value`參數的`ToString()`方法，而`provider`參數會被忽略。If `value` implements neither interface, the method calls the `value` parameter's `ToString()` method, and the `provider` parameter is ignored. `provider`會使用參數，如果`value`參數會實作或介面。The `provider` parameter is used if the `value` parameter implements the or interface. 最常見的用法`provider`參數是指定的轉換中使用的特定文化特性資訊`value`。The most common use of the `provider` parameter is to specify culture-specific information used in the conversion of `value`. 例如，如果`value`參數是負的十進位數字，`provider`參數可以提供用於負號和小數點分隔符號的標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if the `value` parameter is a negative decimal number, the `provider` parameter can supply culture-specific information about the notation used for the negative sign and decimal separator. 第二個範例下, 一節中的說明的格式提供者，不會提供區分文化特性格式資訊。The second example in the next section illustrates a format provider that does not supply culture-sensitive formatting information. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別會覆寫方法，但不會實作介面。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that overrides the method but does not implement the interface. 本範例會示範如何呼叫方法，再呼叫`Temperature.ToString`方法。The example illustrates how calls to the method, in turn, call the `Temperature.ToString` method. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToString2#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tostring2/cs/tostring5.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToString2#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.tostring2/vb/tostring5.vb#26)] 下列範例會定義`Temperature`類別可實作介面，但不會實作介面。The following example defines a `Temperature` class that implements the interface but does not implement the interface. 其實作代表`Temperature`攝氏、 華氏、 或開氏，根據格式字串的值。Its implementation represents the `Temperature` value in Celsius, Fahrenheit, or Kelvin, depending on the format string. 此範例也會定義`TemperatureProvider`類別可實作，並提供隨機產生的格式字串，以供實作`Temperature`類別。The example also defines a `TemperatureProvider` class that implements and provides a randomly generated format string that is used by the implementation of the `Temperature` class.
