remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`HexString`可實作類別介面，且設計用來保存這兩個 16 位元帶正負號和 16 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 16-bit signed and 16-bit unsigned values. 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt16#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint16/cs/touint16_3.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt16#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint16/vb/touint16_3.vb#16)] 下列範例顯示呼叫方法，傳遞`HexString`物件做為參數，接著，呼叫實作`HexString`類別。The following example shows that a call to the method that passes a `HexString` object as a parameter, in turn, calls the implementation of the `HexString` class. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt16#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint16/cs/touint16_3.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt16#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint16/vb/touint16_3.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果上`value`。The return value is the result of invoking on `value`. `provider` 已取得的執行個體物件。`provider` is an instance that obtains a object. 物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`. 如果`provider`已`null`，則會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the for the current culture is used. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the method instead. 它會傳回值，指出轉換是否成功或失敗。It returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed. ## Examples 下列範例會定義自訂物件，會將字串"pos"辨識為正號和字串"neg 」 為負號。The following example defines a custom object that recognizes the string "pos" as the positive sign and the string "neg" as the negative sign. 就會嘗試將數字的字串陣列的每個項目轉換成整數使用此提供者和文化特性而異的提供者。It then attempts to convert each element of a numeric string array to an integer using both this provider and the provider for the invariant culture. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料類型支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有的 16 位元用來代表數字的值，並不存在的正負號位元。In other words, all 16 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的整數值，超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed integer value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「 0x8000 將轉換成 32768。 」Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000 converts to 32768." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#11)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認方法或運算子會使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會發佈者出現不當使用二進位表示法解譯使用二補數表示法，來將十六進位字串轉換成值值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a value. 範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 當此範例將值轉換成值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），此方法會擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#12)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成帶正負號的 16 位元整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned 16-bit integer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`HexString`可實作類別介面，且設計用來保存這兩個 32 位元帶正負號和 32 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 32-bit signed and 32-bit unsigned values. 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt32#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint32/cs/touint32_4.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt32#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint32/vb/touint32_4.vb#18)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料類型支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有 32 位元用來代表數字的值，並不存在的正負號位元。In other words, all 32 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的整數值，超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed integer value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「 0x80000000 將轉換成 2147483648。 」Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x80000000 converts to 2147483648." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#13)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認方法或運算子會使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會發佈者出現不當使用二進位表示法解譯使用二補數表示法，來將十六進位字串轉換成值值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a value. 範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 當此範例將值轉換成值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），此方法會擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#14)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換為不帶正負號的整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned integer. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt32#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint32/cs/touint32_3.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt32#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint32/vb/touint32_3.vb#16)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果方法的基礎類型`value`。The return value is the result of invoking the method of the underlying type of `value`. `provider` 可讓使用者指定的內容相關的特定文化特性的轉換資訊`value`。`provider` enables the user to specify culture-specific conversion information about the contents of `value`. 例如，如果`value`是，表示為數字，`provider`可能會提供用來代表該數字標記法的特定文化特性資訊。For example, if `value` is a that represents a number, `provider` could supply culture-specific information about the notation used to represent that number. 基底型別忽略`provider`; 不過，如果可以使用參數`value`是使用者定義型別可實作介面。The base types ignore `provider`; however, the parameter may be used if `value` is a user-defined type that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列範例會定義`HexString`可實作類別介面，且設計用來保存這兩個 64 位元帶正負號和 64 位元不帶正負號值的字串表示。The following example defines a `HexString` class that implements the interface and that is designed to hold the string representation of both 64-bit signed and 64-bit unsigned values. 類別包含`Sign`表示正負號的十六進位值的屬性。The class includes a `Sign` property that indicates the sign of its hexadecimal value. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt64#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/cs/touint64_4.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt64#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/vb/touint64_4.vb#17)] 下列範例顯示呼叫方法，傳遞`HexString`物件做為參數，接著，呼叫實作`HexString`類別。The following example shows that a call to the method that passes a `HexString` object as a parameter, in turn, calls the implementation of the `HexString` class. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt64#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/cs/touint64_4.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt64#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/vb/touint64_4.vb#18)]

span.span: Converts the specified string representation of a number to an equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer, using the specified culture-specific formatting information.

returns.span: 與 中之數字相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 為 ，則為 0 (零)。

span.span: A 64-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in , or 0 (zero) if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是叫用的結果上`value`。The return value is the result of invoking on `value`. `provider` 已實作，可取得物件。`provider` is an implementation that obtains a object. 物件提供特定文化特性格式資訊`value`。The object provides culture-specific information about the format of `value`. 如果`provider`已`null`，則物件會使用目前的文化特性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. 如果您不想處理的例外狀況，如果轉換失敗，您可以呼叫方法改為。If you prefer not to handle an exception if the conversion fails, you can call the method instead. 它會傳回值，指出轉換是否成功或失敗。It returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded or failed. ## Examples 下列範例會定義自訂物件，會將字串"pos"辨識為正號和字串"neg 」 為負號。The following example defines a custom object that recognizes the string "pos" as the positive sign and the string "neg" as the negative sign. 它接著會嘗試將數字的字串陣列的每個項目轉換成不帶正負號長整數。It then attempts to convert each element of a numeric string array to an unsigned long integer. 轉換會使用這兩個自訂提供者和文化特性而異的提供者。The conversion uses both the custom provider and the provider for the invariant culture. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt64#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/cs/touint64_2.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt64#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/vb/touint64_2.vb#15)]

exception.span: 不是由選擇性正負號之後跟隨一連串數字 (0 到 9) 所組成。

span.span: does not consist of an optional sign followed by a sequence of digits (0 through 9).

exception.span: 代表小於 或大於 的數字。

span.span: represents a number that is less than or greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: public static ulong ToUInt64 (string value, int fromBase);
.method public static hidebysig unsigned int64 ToUInt64(string value, int32 fromBase) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToUInt64 (value As String, fromBase As Integer) As ULong
public: static System::UInt64 ToUInt64(System::String ^ value, int fromBase);
static member ToUInt64 : string * int -> uint64

param.name: value
param.span: 字串，包含要轉換的數字。

span.span: A string that contains the number to convert.

param.name: fromBase
param.span: value 中數字的基底，必須是 2、8、10 或 16。

span.span: The base of the number in value, which must be 2, 8, 10, or 16.

summary.span: 將指定基底中數字的字串表示，轉換為相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數。

span.span: Converts the string representation of a number in a specified base to an equivalent 64-bit unsigned integer.

returns.span: 與 中之數字相等的 64 位元不帶正負號的整數；如果 為 ，則為 0 (零)。

span.span: A 64-bit unsigned integer that is equivalent to the number in , or 0 (zero) if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`fromBase`16，您可以使用前置詞指定的數字`value`"0x"或"0x"的參數。If `fromBase` is 16, you can prefix the number specified by the `value` parameter with "0x" or "0X". 因為資料類型支援不帶正負號的值僅方法會假設`value`使用不帶正負號的二進位表示法來表示。Because the data type supports unsigned values only, the method assumes that `value` is expressed using unsigned binary representation. 換句話說，所有的 64 位元用來代表數字的值，並正負號位元不存在。In other words, all 64 bits are used to represent the numeric value, and a sign bit is absent. 如此一來，就可以撰寫程式碼所在的帶正負號的長整數值，超出資料類型轉換為價值不擲回例外狀況的方法。As a result, it is possible to write code in which a signed long integer value that is out of the range of the data type is converted to a value without the method throwing an exception. 下列範例會將轉換其十六進位字串表示法，然後呼叫方法。The following example converts to its hexadecimal string representation, and then calls the method. 而不是擲回例外狀況，此方法會顯示訊息，「 0x8000000000000000 將轉換成 9223372036854775808。 」Instead of throwing an exception, the method displays the message, "0x8000000000000000 converts to 9223372036854775808." [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#15)] 執行二進位運算或數值轉換，它一律是確認方法或運算子會使用適當的數值表示法來轉譯特定的值，開發人員的責任。When performing binary operations or numeric conversions, it is always the responsibility of the developer to verify that a method or operator is using the appropriate numeric representation to interpret a particular value. 下列範例說明的技巧，確保方法不會發佈者出現不當使用二進位表示法解譯使用二補數表示法，來將十六進位字串轉換成值值。The following example illustrates one technique for ensuring that the method does not inappropriately use binary representation to interpret a value that uses two's complement representation when converting a hexadecimal string to a value. 範例會判斷值，代表帶正負號或不帶正負號的整數，而它會將該值轉換為其字串表示。The example determines whether a value represents a signed or an unsigned integer while it is converting that value to its string representation. 當此範例將值轉換成值，它會檢查原始的值是否為帶正負號的整數。When the example converts the value to a value, it checks whether the original value was a signed integer. 若是如此，並設定其高序位位元 （表示原始值為負），此方法會擲回例外狀況。If so, and if its high-order bit is set (which indicates that the original value was negative), the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.BaseConversion#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/cs/Conversion.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.BaseConversion#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Convert.BaseConversion/vb/Conversion.vb#16)] ## Examples 下列範例會嘗試解譯為十六進位值的數字的字串陣列中每個項目，並將它轉換成不帶正負號的長整數。The following example attempts to interpret each element in an array of numeric strings as a hexadecimal value and to convert it to an unsigned long integer. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToUInt64#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/cs/touint64_3.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToUInt64#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.touint64/vb/touint64_3.vb#16)]
